name: LymeDiseaseTestsForBorreliaBurgdorferiAntibodyByImmunoassay
title: Lyme Disease (Tests for Borrelia burgdorferi Antibody by Immunoassay)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia antibody by EIA IFA.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Borrelia burgdorferi Ab; Immunoassay including EIA and IFA),(Exclusion Criteria: Interpretations)
